title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama-2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; supports streaming chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components with callback streaming.

title: ollama-webui (now Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama supporting multi-user chat, RAG, plugins, and OpenAI API compatibility.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and async support; available on Maven Central.

title: ollamajs (npm wrapper)
summary: Lightweight npm package wrapping the Ollama REST endpoints for Node.js and browsers.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio and serde.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET library and CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models from C# with streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style plugin that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple CLI tool to build a private RAG system with Ollama, Chroma, and PDF ingestion.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into guild channels with role-based access.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command for chatting with local models privately.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama endpoints via Django REST framework with async views.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component and demo app for chatting with Ollama models in a shareable web UI.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate Ollama chat and embeddings into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes using local models.
